methodologies.note: Multimedia resources and material will be integrated in in-class discussion
Students will conduct critical analysis over contemporary issues of vocational education and present the findings in national conference or submit for journal publication.

grading.note: Weekly summary and critique of assigned readings
Students should be fully engaged in in-class discussion.
Written note should be submitted to the University to finalize the time-off process.
Students should conduct an in-class presentation to summarize the assigned readings and introduce additional text related to the topic of presentation.

Students are required to submit a term paper and critique relevant literature and practice of vocational education.
Deadline：3:00 pm, 12/28/2022

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
